Articles.Content:
> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/h20rP)

**V 1.0**

The Vilniux Interceptor is the result of multiple tests relating Attitude and maneuverability, that could be carried on thanks to Zokesia Skunkwork's Betatesting. Featuring both High and Low attitude flights, along with an EXTREME MANEUVERABILITY, allows you to control this Interceptor (that comes with 2 missiles that fire straight) to the fully potential. These light missiles (named

**HX MISSILE**

, or HX Non-Seeking Missiles) allow you to destroy the enemy planes with ease.

http://www./download/wckha4gl72xn11c/Vilniux_Interceptor.craft

Download link

Made by [SKYTRAVEL](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116768-STOCK-Skytravel-HIRING-1-0)

Feel free to leave comments here and in the skytravel thread!
Nice plane! Worried about fuel range though....

> 
> Nice plane! Worried about fuel range though....

Will try and fix it, along with some pitch down problems when the fuel reaches 5%
